questions.instructions: Which TWO of the following does the chef say are true of the herb oregano? Choose TWO letters A-F.
questions.question: Select the TWO correct answers:

mc_options.text: A. It's easy to sprinkle on food
mc_options.feedback: This is not mentioned by the chef. Listen for what the chef actually says about oregano's use and characteristics.
The chef doesn't make this comparison. Focus on the specific properties mentioned in the audio.

mc_options.text: C. It's used in the majority of Italian dishes
mc_options.feedback: Correct! The chef mentions that oregano is used in most Italian dishes.

mc_options.text: D. It has a lemony flavour
mc_options.feedback: This is not the flavor profile described by the chef. Listen again for the actual taste description.

mc_options.text: E. It gives food a rounded flavour
mc_options.feedback: While the chef discusses flavor, this specific description is not used. Review the audio for the exact wording.

mc_options.text: F. It's a good accompaniment to many meat dishes
mc_options.feedback: Correct! The chef states that oregano pairs well with various meat dishes.
